EmailTemplate.description: Internal notification for Escalated Cases to the Product Team
EmailTemplate.name: Escalated Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Escalated Case: #{!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Copado Support A milestone is ticking ... somebody action this. Get on slack to see if somebody else is looking at it too.
Please take a look ASAP. Case Number: #{!Case.CaseNumber} Issue definition: {!Case.Description} Case Link: {!Case.Link} Kind regards, Copado Support Team
Case tracking Id: {!Case.Thread_Id} Copado Solutions S.L.
